title: 42 Restaurant Traffic is Down by Almost 30 Percent
description: In this episode of The Barron Report Live, Paul discusses the multiple headlines announcing the store closures of popular restaurant brands, the changing landscape in the restaurant reservation app space, and SoftBank's big investment in Zume Pizza.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Barron Report Live, Paul discusses the multiple headlines announcing the store closures of popular restaurant brands, the changing landscape in the restaurant reservation app space, and SoftBank's big investment in Zume Pizza.
